title: Investigate the House of Grief
content:
Investigate the House of Grief Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Baldur's Gate Reward __reward__

Investigate the House of Grief

Investigate the House of Grief is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Investigate the House of Grief can be acquired during Act 3. This quest can be obtained when you reach Baldur's Gate. All Baldur's Gate quests will be grouped together in your quest journal. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earn more lo
